categories: Category:Imperial Navy admirals of the Galactic Empire

nodes.text: Admiral  Kohrin was an Imperial Navy officer in command of at least two fleets.

Kohrin used the Enforcer as his flagship. When it and his second fleet were attacked near Bespin by Rebel forces led by Luke Skywalker, it looked like he was going to lose the battle until Imperial reinforcements arrived.

Once Skywalker's forces had been forced to withdraw, Kohrin sent the Enforcer to Phaylenn to be repaired and took revenge by attacking what he thought was a Rebel base on Ahlenn with the remainder of his fleet. What he did not know, however, was that the base had been abandoned by the Rebels two months previously.
